</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the object position above sea level. Given position must be in [[PositionASL]] format. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[setPosASL]] pos </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[PositionASL]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setPosASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 0, ([[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 1) + 10, [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 2];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[this]] [[setPosASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[this]] [[select]] 0, [[position]] [[this]] [[select]] 1, 9];  <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[ X, Y, Z]</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ASLToATL]], [[ATLToASL]], [[getPos]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosATL]], [[position]], [[setPos]], [[setPosASL2]], [[setPosATL]], [[getTerrainHeightASL]], [[setPosWorld]], [[setVehiclePosition]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
